title: [Neuroscience] Using post-mortem tissue samples, scientists showed that SARS-CoV-2 enters the brain via nerve cells in the olfactory mucosa. For the first time, researchers have been able to produce electron microscope images of intact coronavirus particles inside the olfactory mucosa.
[Epidemiology] Covid-19 Likely in U.S. in Mid-December 2019, CDC Scientists Report
